creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
inscription: {koma tomete/ sode uchi-harau/ kage mo nashi/ sano no watari no/ yuki no yugure} (Stopping my horse/ to brush my sleeves/ I leave not even a shadow/ at the Sano crossing/ in the snowfall at dusk)
medium: Hanging scroll, center of a triptych, ink and light color on silk
object_name: hanging scroll, one of a triptych
signed: LRC: 法橋具慶筆 {hōkyō Gukei hitsu}
title: Rider [center of a triptych of Three Scenes of Autumn Evening]
